description:
Safe and visible. Tick those two boxes with this high-performance PFD. It's also quick drying and won't prevent your little one from having tons of fun. The built-in grab handle makes it easier to get a hold of kids in the water.

  • Durable 200-denier nylon shell is light and dries fast
  • Over-the-head entry with side buckle fits comfortably and securely
  • Fleece-lined handwarmer tunnel pocket
  • Reflective trim for better visibility
  • Tethered signal whistle in case of emergency
  • Meets Harmonized Level 70 buoyancy standard. Approved by Transport Canada and US Coast Guard
  • Fits a weight range of 55-88 lbs
name: Mustang Survival Bobby Foam Vest - Youths
